data.title: PSP Action Video Games | 3
data.meta_description: Page 3. Action video games for PSP sorted by popularity among gamers. Action games are all about fast pace, dexterity, and reflexes. Examples: Uncharted series, GTA series.
data.text:
Hakuoki: Warriors of the Shinsengumi

Action 22 March 2012

Three-dimensional action game, which was set in nineteenth-century Japan. The title divides the plot and the characters presented with the Hakuoki adventure published at the Polish Fine Arts Academy: Demon of the Fleeting Blossom. Players take on the role of one of the captains of the Shinsengumi special police force, which fights revolutionaries who want to overthrow the shogunat.

Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Action 16 November 2010

An action game based on the highly-popular series of books and movies about the adventures of Harry Potter. The newest interactive adaptation makes the young wizard face the merciless Lord Voldemort. The developers focused on dynamic battles and some additional action-adventure features.

Scarface: Money. Power. Respect.

Action 05 October 2006

Scarface: Money. Power. Respect. is a game with FarSight Studios, based on the cult film, known in Poland as Man with a Scar. Unlike the stationary version, however, the mobile version offers complex tactical gameplay.

Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest

Action 27 June 2006

Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest is an electronic-entertainment adaptation of a film of the same name (the Polish title is Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest), which is a continuation of the 2003 hit "Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl.

Star Wars: The Clone Wars - Republic Heroes

Action 06 October 2009

Action game set in the famous universe of Star Wars. It allows us to take part in events that are a bridge between the first and second season of the animated series about clone wars.

Army of Two: The 40th Day

Action 12 January 2010

Army of Two: The 40th Day is a continuation of the shooter by EA Montreal. Again, you assume the roles of Rios and Salem who take part in a conflict in ruined Shanghai.

Tenchu: Shadow Assassins

Action 12 February 2009

The next part of the cycle about the adventures of ninja warriors prepared by the authors of the original Tenchu. Here we have a counterpoint over the two heroes known from previous editions - Rikimaru and Ayame.

Martial Arts: Capoeira

Action canceled

Martial Arts: Capoeira is a sport fight enriched with RPG elements, which was made by Italian Twelve Interactive development studio. The player takes on the role of one of the 12 players in the Brazilian martial arts of the title and takes part in spectacular duels. Each hero is described by a set of attributes that can be developed during the game. The creators took care of several gameplay options, including Tournament, Arcade and Survival modes.

WALL-E

Action 24 June 2008

An electronic version of the adventures of the title work. The whole is based directly on the animated film by Pixar studio. We travel all over the galaxy, exploring interesting locations and defeating enemies.

Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End

Action 22 May 2007

Pirates of the Caribbean: At World’s End is an action adventure game that uses themes depicted in the second and third parts of the movie series Pirates of the Caribbean. Developers from Eurocom Entertainment decided to show the story from the perspective of Captain Jack Sparrow, however players also get the opportunity to play as both William Turner and Elizabeth Swann.

Star Wars: Battlefront - Renegade Squadron

Action 09 October 2007

Star Wars: Battlefront - Renegade Squadron is a tactical action game designed exclusively for Sony's portable console. It belongs to a popular series, with its roots dating back to 2004 and created on the basis of cult cinematographic works under the Star Wars sign.

Aliens vs Predator: Requiem

Action 13 November 2007

An action game based on a science fiction film under the same title. We play the role of Predator. We set off on hunting, hunting both well-armed commandos and aliens.

Warriors Orochi 2

Action 27 November 2008

Warriors Orochi 2 is an action game created by Omega Force with characters from the Dynasty Warriors and Samurai Warriors series. The heroes, whose actions are directed by the player, once again have to face King Orochi and his servants. The game offers several modes of fun, including story mode and survival mode.

Brave: A Warrior's Tale

Action canceled

Brave: A Warrior's Tale is a remake of the action adventure game Brave: The Search for Spirit Dancer released on PlayStation 2. In addition to the events presented in the original version, A Warrior's Tale offers new challenges, additional materials and improved graphics.

Death Jr. 2: Root of Evil

Action 31 October 2006

Death Jr. 2: Root of Evil represents a genre of platform games in which creators focused on the crazy action and humour of the main characters - DJ and a group of his friends. Of course, the scenario revolves around these characters who are trying to fix the mess caused by the release of the evil and powerful Moloch.

Ghost Rider

Action 13 February 2007

Ghost Rider is an action game based on the popular comic book series of Marvel publishing house and a cinema film of the same title. The protagonist is Johnny Blaze, a motorcyclist and stuntman, who enters into a pact with the devil in exchange for a rescue for a person close to him.

Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker

Action 29 April 2010

A hand-held spin-off to the popular series of stealth games developed by Konami. The game was developed for PlayStation Portable and builds upon 2004's Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater. The story of the game shows further life of Big Boss. Together with an army of mercenaries under his command, he travels to Puerto Rico to investigate why the US government, together with CIA, is backing up a military group present on the island.

God Eater 2

Action 14 November 2013

A sequel to the dynamic action game with RPG features inspired by the Monster Hunter series and developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. Like its predecessor, God Eater 2 was made for PlayStation handhelds. We play as a hero wielding a magical weapon, whose party must deal with more and more powerful monsters. The story starts three years after the events of the first game, in which the world witnessed the invasion of monstrous beats, halted only by the titular God Eaters.

Toukiden: The Age of Demons

Action 27 June 2013

An action TPP game developed by Japanese studio Omega Force (the creators of Dynasty Warriors and Samurai Warriors). Toukiden: The Age of Demons is set in a fantasy world inspired by Japanese mythology and history. The world is being invaded by demons, and you play as an elite warrior protecting one of the humanity's last settlements. The game takes place in the village of Utaka, a half-open location, where you can meet NPCs, receive quests, etc.

Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Predator

Action 01 October 2010

Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Predator is a Tactical Third-Person View (TPP) tactical action game designed for the technical capabilities of the PlayStation Portable handheld console. The player takes control of the title unit of "Ghosts" and takes part in a dangerous military operation in Sri Lanka.

Fat Princess: Fistful of Cake

Action 12 March 2010

A fun arcade game in which we deal with saving the title "fluffy" princess with the use of available armies. At the same time we try to prevent the enemy from performing this task.

Undead Knights

Action 29 September 2009

A spectacular action game in which we play the role of an anti-hero, spreading destruction in fairy-tale lands. We can act alone or together with an army of subordinate zombies.
